data.name: Video Horror Society - MEGAFAN Founders Pack
data.detailed_description:
A super mega deal for a super MEGAFAN! Join the Video Horror Society to earn some serious fan rewards: Collectible Cosmetics, Limited Edition Movies, and even more Fanbux to drive a fan nuts. Dare to go beyond the movies. Become a Founding Fan today!

MEGAFAN Founder’s Pack includes:
The complete SUPERFAN Founder's Pack PLUS…

Exclusive Cosmetics:
Automatically unlock mega cool Video Horror Society merch
  • First Edition Club Painter’s Hat and Club Socks
  • Tortured Soul Gear Set for all launch Monsters
  • MEGA Sticker Set for Teens
  • MEGA Sticker Set for Monsters
  • MEGAFAN Account Portrait
  • 900 Fanbux

PLUS PLUS MEGACUTS of Limited Edition Movies:
Play to unlock mega exclusive lore, cosmetics, and Fanbux rewards!

Spectral Collectors MEGACUT:
  • Stage 2 MEGA Spectra-Suit Costume
  • Oozer Spectral
  • Spectral Scream Emote
  • Spectral Collector Tank Top
  • MEGAFAN Movie Tshirt, Stickers, and Account Portrait
  • PLUS 1050 Fanbux!

Bonvini’s The Evil Never Dies MEGACUT:
  • Malum's Mark Mid Gear (Part 2 of 3) for all launch monsters
  • Malum's Mark Feast FX
  • Open Mind Omen
  • MEGAFAN Movie Tshirt, Stickers, and Account Portrait
  • PLUS 1050 Fanbux!

Become a MEGAFAN today!
*Limited Edition Movies will unlock upon official game release and will never expire

data.short_description: A super mega deal for a super MEGAFAN! Join the Video Horror Society to earn some serious fan rewards: Collectible Cosmetics, Limited Edition Movies, and even more Fanbux to drive a fan nuts. Dare to go beyond the movies. Become a Founding Fan today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 470 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K (3.5Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3GB) or AMD Radeon 7870 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Medium quality settings.
